name: Patton Strikes Back: The Battle of the Bulge
name_original: Patton Strikes Back: The Battle of the Bulge
description:
Patton Strikes Back: The Battle of the Bulge is a strategy game developed by Chris Crawford. It came out on 01-01-1991. It was published by Broderbund Software.
Patton Strikes Back: The Battle of the Bulge is available on PC.
